content: fasten with knot repeat steps 1-3 one more time cut the thread and hide knot and thread tips inside of the head repeat steps 1-3 twice for left eye starting from point 2 1 thread a needle with strong thread in point 1 leaving long tail outside and pull it out at the bottom inner corner of the right eye between rounds 14 and 15 2 insert the needle in the inner corner of the same eye between rounds 12 and 13 and back it out in point 1 3 tight the thread carefully and fasten with knot repeat steps 1-3 for left eye starting from point 2 embroider eye whites with white thread by making stitch along the outer edge of the eye from point between rounds 12 and 13 down to inner point between rounds 15 and 16 very carefully fix this stitch with small amount of transparent fabric glue embroider eyelashes with black thread by making stitch along the line of upper eyelid from inner point between rounds 11 and 12 to point between rounds 13 and 14 in 1stitch outward from edge of the eye very carefully fix stitch with small amount of transparent fabric glue embroider eyebrows with black thread i used more thin thread than for eyelashes by making short stitches on round 8 with length 1st up with 10sts apart embroider nostrils with light brown thread by making stitches between rounds 15 and 16 with length 1st with 3sts apart decorate your snake with crown or tiara by sewing it to the head roll snake into the ring or tie it with a knot you can watch this short video to choose which way you like more for those who like dragons more than snakes please visit toyfoxstore etsy com 8
